text: The Cincinnati Cyclones are a ice hockey team in the ECHL (East Coast Hockey League). They used to be in the IHL (International Hockey League). The team plays in Cincinnati, Ohio. The Cyclones won a championship (the Kelly Cup championship) in the 2007â€“2008 season. This was the first time they had won a championship in 18 years. ==Other websites== * *The CycWard - Section 60: Cyclones Fan Web Site Category:1990 establishments in the United States Category:Buffalo Sabres Category:ECHL teams Category:Florida Panthers Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Nashville Predators Category:New Jersey Devils Category:New York Rangers Category:Sports in Cincinnati
title: Cincinnati Cyclones
